title: Shin Kyouhaku 2 The Animation: Kizu ni Saku Hana Senketsu no Kurenai
synopsis: Akehime Saki has a beautiful girl who has an English mother. She has a secret. She is going out with her teacher, Tsuge Akito, and holding such an immoral secret makes her exited. However there is a figure looking at their acts.
